DeepSpiringMod:Sampling.NAME: Sampling
DESCRIPTIONS: At the #ystart of each turn, draw %d card from your discard pile randomly.
At the #ystart of each turn, draw %d cards from your discard pile randomly.

DeepSpiringMod:RecursionDepth.NAME: RecursionDepth
DESCRIPTIONS: When the number of stacks reaches #y10, stop all forward propagation and add an #yOverflow in your hand.

DeepSpiringMod:Loss.NAME: Loss
DESCRIPTIONS: Current loss of the model. Reducing the stacks of #rLoss is beneficial for improving the #yAP .

DeepSpiringMod:Overfitting.NAME: Overfitting
DESCRIPTIONS: Demonstrated the current model's adaptability to unseen datasets. High Overfitting stacks would make the battle tought.

DeepSpiringMod:AP.NAME: AP
DESCRIPTIONS: Model performance on testing set, which affect the effectiveness of some of the cards and powers.

DeepSpiringMod:Convolution.NAME: Convolution
DESCRIPTIONS: During #yForward #yPropagation, play a #yFeature #yMap with attacks and blocks, whose values are equal to the convolution of all card values in the discard pile multiplied by the 50% #yAP.

DeepSpiringMod:SGD.NAME: SGD
DESCRIPTIONS: Randomly remove a stack of #rLoss and gain a stack of #rOverfitting %d time at the start of each turn.
Randomly remove a stack of #rLoss and gain a stack of #rOverfitting %d times at the start of each turn.

DeepSpiringMod:DataLeakage.NAME: Data Leakage
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain a stack of #rOverfitting %d time at the start of each turn.
Gain a stack of #rOverfitting %d times at the start of each turn.

DeepSpiringMod:AIForm.NAME: AI Form
DESCRIPTIONS: No cards will be drawn at the start of the turn. NL Each turn, one #yAttention #yHead , #yForward #yPropagation , #yPositional #yEncoding , and one random card are placed in hand.
No cards will be drawn at the start of the turn. NL Each turn, one #yAttention #yHead , #yForward #yPropagation , #yPositional #yEncoding , and one random card are placed in hand.
